Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it does not handle the case when the input array is empty. It tries to access the first element of the array without checking if it exists, which will throw an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException for an empty array. Generated Test cases 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 should pass the buggy code as they have at least one element in the array. Test case 8 should fail the buggy code as it is an empty array.
